actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Mother Teresa of Calcutta deserves the 1975 Nobel Peace Prize for her service to humanity.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that Mother Teresa of Calcutta deserves the Nobel Peace prize and should be given consideration for such prize.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Mother Teresa of Calcutta deserves the 1975 Nobel Peace Prize for her service to humanity.
